actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communication Act of 1934 to require that the live television transmission of certain sporting events be available by broadcast over a national broadcast television network.
short_title: Public Access to National Sporting Events Act

summary.text: Public Access to National Sporting Events Act - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require that the live television broadcasting of the Super Bowl and World Series be carried over a national television network by affiliated stations.

titles.title: Public Access to National Sporting Events Act
A bill to amend the Communication Act of 1934 to require that the live television transmission of certain sporting events be available by broadcast over a national broadcast television network.
